original_text: Again there was a day when the sons of God came to present themselves before the Lord, and Satan also came among them to present himself before the Lord.
korean_text: 또 하루는 하나님의 아들들이 와서 여호와 앞에 서고 사탄도 그들 가운데에 와서 여호와 앞에 서니

sentences.original_text: when the sons of God came
to present themselves before the Lord
and Satan also came among them
to present himself before the Lord
